name: Rez
author: Milliardo
notes: Originally I just wanted to level up Jesse and unlock his skills through pvp. Since he has the Tie that binds, I chose REZ. But surprisingly REZ is pretty good in current meta. I decided to to tech in 2 Chalices to deal with Sylvans, 2 Cosmic Cyclones to deal with water or backrow in general and 3x REZ for the OTK.
